price: 10. Entonces (el hombre) no podrá salvarse a sí mismo ni tendrá a nadie que lo socorra.
arabic: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٖ وَلَا نَاصِرٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: famā lahu min quwwatin walā nāṣirin
